languages.text: "Изумительно! Как только вы изволите закончить с поисками, я буду..." {n}Губернатор пытается встать из-за стола, но гравитация оказывается сильнее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Изумительно! Как только вы изволите закончить с поисками, я буду..." {n}Губернатор пытается встать из-за стола, но земное притяжение оказывается сильнее.{/n}

languages.text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Изумительно! Как только вы изволите закончить с поисками, я буду..." {n}Губернатор пытается встать из-за стола, но гравитация оказывается сильнее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The Governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}
"Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The Governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

"Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

languages.text: “太棒了！等您的搜查结束之后，我将会……”{n}总督试图站起身来，但肥硕的身体却把他拖了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “太棒了！等您的搜查结束之后，我将会……”{n}总督试图站起身来，但肥硕的身体却把他拖了下来。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Maravilloso! En cuanto haya terminado su investigación, estaré...». {n}El gobernador hace el amago de levantarse de la mesa, pero la gravedad se impone a su sentido del equilibrio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Maravilloso! En cuanto haya terminado su investigación, estaré...». {n}El gobernador hace el amago de levantarse de la mesa, pero la gravedad se impone a su sentido del equilibrio.{/n}

languages.text: "Harika! Siz araştırmanızı bitirir bitirmez ben de..." {n}Vali, masadan kalkmaya yeltense de yer çekimine karşı koyamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Harika! Siz araştırmanızı bitirir bitirmez ben de..." {n}Vali, masadan kalkmaya yeltense de yer çekimine karşı koyamıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「素晴らしい！あなたの調査が終わったらできるだけ早く、私は…」{n}総督はテーブルから立とうとするが、重力がそれに勝る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい！あなたの調査が終わったらできるだけ早く、私は…」{n}総督はテーブルから立とうとするが、重力がそれに勝る。{/n}

languages.text: « Excellent ! Dès que vous en aurez fini avec vos recherches, je serai... » {n}Le gouverneur tente de se lever de table, mais la gravité lui fait obstacle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Excellent ! Dès que vous en aurez fini avec vos recherches, je serai... » {n}Le gouverneur tente de se lever de table, mais la gravité lui fait obstacle.{/n}

languages.text: "Wunderbar! Sobald Ihr mit Eurer Suche fertig seid, werde ich ..." {n}Der Gouverneur versucht, sich vom Tisch zu erheben, doch die Schwerkraft erweist sich als stärker.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Marvellous! As soon as you are done with your search, I will be..." {n}The governor attempts to rise from the table, but gravity proves to be his superior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wunderbar! Sobald Ihr mit Eurer Suche fertig seid, werde ich ..." {n}Der Gouverneur versucht, sich vom Tisch zu erheben, doch die Schwerkraft erweist sich als stärker.{/n}
